name: Juniper Networks Junos OS Evolved内存错误引用漏洞
product: ["Juniper    Junos OS Evolved >= 23.2-EVO\uff0c<23.2R2-S2-EVO", "Juniper    Junos OS Evolved >= 23.4-EVO\uff0c<23.4R2-S2-EVO", "Juniper    Junos OS Evolved >= 24.2-EVO\uff0c<24.2R1-S2-EVO", "Juniper    Junos OS Evolved >=22.4-EVO\uff0c<22.4R3-S5-EVO", "Juniper    Junos OS Evolved >=24.2R2-EVO"]
description: Juniper Networks Junos OS Evolved是美国瞻博网络（Juniper Networks）公司的Junos OS的升级版系统。Juniper Networks Junos OS Evolved存在内存错误引用漏洞，该漏洞源于处理特定畸形IPv6数据包时未释放内核内存，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致内存耗尽和系统崩溃，从而造成拒绝服务。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://supportportal.juniper.net/JSA92869
patch: Juniper Networks Junos OS Evolved内存错误引用漏洞的补丁
